title: D-instantons and Matrix Models
abstract: We discuss the Matrix Model aspect of configurations saturating a fixed number of fermionic zero modes. This number is independent of the rank of the gauge group and the instanton number. This will allow us to define a large-$N_c$ limit of the embeddeding of $K$ D-instantons in the Matrix Model and make contact with the leading term (the measure factor) of the supergravity computations of D-instanton effects. We show that the connection between these two approaches is done through the Abelian modes of the Matrix variables.
